name: Among Us VR
abstract: Among Us VR is a party game of teamwork and betrayal.

detail.app_developer: Schell Games, Innersloth LLC, and Robot Teddy
detail.app_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, German, Japanese, Korean, French, Spanish, Italian
detail.app_release_note:
- New limited time event has been added: Dum Justice is a new mode available where the killing is fast and furious and vengeance can come from any corner.
- A new role has been added: Vigilante! Take out vengeance on the Impostor (or anyone else) with the ability to kill.
- The Skeld II has been updated with a functional Security Camera system. Jump into cams across the map to peek at Crewmates all from the comfort of the security office.
- A new cosmetic type has been added with Gloves! Show off your fancy hands in style with the ability to decorate your own mitts.
- New cosmetic packs have been added to support Vigilante and Gloves.
